name: HasCompactMulSupport.sup
initialProofState:
X : Type u_1
M : Type u_2
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace X
inst✝¹ : One M
inst✝ : SemilatticeSup M
f g : X → M
hf : HasCompactMulSupport f
hg : HasCompactMulSupport g
⊢ HasCompactMulSupport (Max.max f g)
decl:
@[to_additive]
theorem HasCompactMulSupport.sup {f g : X → M} (hf : HasCompactMulSupport f)
    (hg : HasCompactMulSupport g) :  HasCompactMulSupport (f ⊔ g) := by
  apply IsCompact.of_isClosed_subset (IsCompact.union hf hg) (isClosed_mulTSupport _)
  rw [mulTSupport, mulTSupport, mulTSupport, ← closure_union]
  apply closure_mono
  exact Function.mulSupport_sup f g

name: HasCompactSupport.sup
initialProofState:
X : Type u_1

inst✝¹ : Zero M
inst✝ : SemilatticeSup M

hg : HasCompactSupport g
⊢ HasCompactSupport (Max.max f g)
decl:
@[to_additive]
theorem HasCompactMulSupport.sup {f g : X → M} (hf : HasCompactMulSupport f)
    (hg : HasCompactMulSupport g) :  HasCompactMulSupport (f ⊔ g) := by
  apply IsCompact.of_isClosed_subset (IsCompact.union hf hg) (isClosed_mulTSupport _)
  rw [mulTSupport, mulTSupport, mulTSupport, ← closure_union]
  apply closure_mono
  exact Function.mulSupport_sup f g

name: HasCompactMulSupport.inf
initialProofState:
X : Type u_1
M : Type u_2
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace X
inst✝¹ : One M
inst✝ : SemilatticeInf M
f g : X → M
hf : HasCompactMulSupport f
hg : HasCompactMulSupport g
⊢ HasCompactMulSupport (Min.min f g)
decl:
@[to_additive]
theorem HasCompactMulSupport.inf {f g : X → M} (hf : HasCompactMulSupport f)
    (hg : HasCompactMulSupport g) :  HasCompactMulSupport (f ⊓ g) := by
  apply IsCompact.of_isClosed_subset (IsCompact.union hf hg) (isClosed_mulTSupport _)
  rw [mulTSupport, mulTSupport, mulTSupport, ← closure_union]
  apply closure_mono
  exact Function.mulSupport_inf f g
